World Traveler.Description: (Highly recommended) Unlock up to 400 additional recipes under the 'World Traveler' config! A new shopkeeper NPC seeking help with a quest, weekly cooking episodes over the radio, fun cutscenes with villagers, and more! [If you turn World Traveler OFF - You will get the lite version of the mod.]

Enable Flexible Recipes.Description: (Recommend use with Love of Cooking.) Allows using a wider variety of ingredients, such as using any butter item in recipes which require butter, or using any cheese in recipes which require cheese, and more. Turn this off if you have bugs with cooking recipes.

Enable Hyperflexible Recipes.Description: (HIGHLY RECOMMEND use with Love of Cooking.) Cook with similar items from other mods. For example, SVE cucumbers, or VMV olives, or WAG syrups can be used in Cornucopia recipes. *Be careful of accidentally using ingredients you don't want to lose - balance is not guaranteed.

Ingredient Indicator.Description: Label hyperflexible ingredients in the cooking menu with this option, letting you know which ingredients can be substituted. Only does something when Enable Hyperflexible Recipes is turned on.

Enable Flavored Recipes.Description: (Requires Extra Machine Configs, Love of Cooking recommended) With Enable Flexible Recipes or Enable Hyperflexible Recipes turned on, this allows a few recipes to be specially flavored and colored based on the ingredient used to make it. For example, using a Strawberry to make a Fruit Smoothie will result in a Strawberry Smoothie.

Enable Vanilla Recipe Changes.Description: Tweak some vanilla recipes slightly to fit Cornucopia's design, ie Chocolate Cake using Chocolate.

Patch Duplicate Names.Description: Changes the name of Baked Potato, Grilled Cheese, and/or Croissant if LoC, SVE, or VMV are installed, to prevent identical recipe names. May or may not change additional duplicate names in the future.

Foods Contain Dairy.Description: A very inconsequential option. Changes the internal data of dairy-containing items to say whether or not they have dairy (for use with BarleyZP's Allergies or NPC gift tastes).

Radio Accessibility.Description: Adds a screenreader-accessible text reminder in the morning when a new cooking episode is on the radio, in addition to the default visual reminder.

Recipe Book Accessibility.Description: For players that use screenreader support, this option replaces the custom recipe book menu with a more intuitive message box that has only text descriptions instead of images.

Enable Installation Help Message.Description: Gives you a tiny info message in SMAPI letting you know what tier of the mod you have. If you don't need the message anymore, you can turn it off here!
